name: KyaBhaiya
text1: Aasha krta hu tujhe psnd aayega !
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Janam Din ki hardik shubhkaamnye !...waghera waghera
text2: Ye sab to maine tujhe bhej hi diya hai pehle.
text3: Socha ek gift bhi bhej du alag se.
text4: Or phir maine ye gift banaya tere liye...
outroText: Tera photo ni tha phone change kiya to udd gaya sb isliye internet se tere jaisa photo utha liya.
replayText: Dobara dekhna hai to CLICK ME.
